meta.content: Front Page; New York and Region
meta.name: online_sections

block.p: Ulster Pact Threatened A showdown is shaping up in the major Protestant party that could lead to an end to the power-sharing government at the heart of Northern Ireland's peace accord.
Listening for Lazio Supporters of Representative Rick A. Lazio are concerned that his Senate campaign is adrift, leaving him without a clear message.
Ulster Pact Threatened A showdown is shaping up in the major Protestant party that could lead to an end to the power-sharing government at the heart of Northern Ireland's peace accord.
Listening for Lazio Supporters of Representative Rick A. Lazio are concerned that his Senate campaign is adrift, leaving him without a clear message.
Vincent Canby Dies The longtime film and theater critic for The New York Times, who was known for conversational prose and a warm smile, was 76.
